description: The function unique_name_411 is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly uses the 'name' parameter to create a new HTML element without properly sanitizing it. An attacker could provide a 'name' value that includes malicious script, which would then be executed when the new element is created. This could lead to a variety of attacks, such as stealing sensitive information or performing actions on behalf of the user.
